Module.Content: <FORM> <INPUT type="button" value="Add Quotes" onClick="window.open('https://sites.google.com/site/fjampages/add-quotes-to-messages','mywindow','width=800,height=400')"> <INPUT type="button" value="Add Quotes" onClick="window.open('http://tinyurl.com/bozdj5d','mywindow','width=200,height=600')"> </FORM>
